SEARCH
Package Server.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Server.Controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameCommand, Serializable, Remote
public class GameController extends UnicastRemoteObject implements GameCommand, Serializable
The GameController class represents the controller for a game. It manages the game model, players, phases, and turns progression. This class implements the GameCommand interface and is Serializable.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(String lobbyID, HashMap<String,ClientHandler> players) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new GameController instance with the specified game model and players.
      Parameters:
      lobbyID - the lobby ID that the gameController is associated with.
      players - A HashMap of players participating in the game, where the key is the player ID and the value is the corresponding ClientHandler.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

  • Method Details

    • getGameModel

      public GameModel getGameModel()
      Returns the GameModel associated with this GameController.
      Returns:
      the GameModel associated with this GameController

    • selectTiles

      public void selectTiles(String playerID, List<Coordinates> coordinates) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to select tiles during their turn. The selected tiles will be used for inserting them on the game board.
      Specified by:
      selectTiles in interface GameCommand
      Parameters:
      playerID - The ID of the player making the selection.
      coordinates - The list of coordinates representing the tiles to be selected.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • insertTiles

      public void insertTiles(String playerID, List<Integer> sort, int column) throws RemoteException
      Inserts the selected tiles onto the game board at the specified column.
      Specified by:
      insertTiles in interface GameCommand
      Parameters:
      playerID - The ID of the player performing the tile insertion.
      sort - The list of indexes representing the sorting order of the tiles to be inserted.
      column - The column where the tiles will be inserted.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • writeChat

      public void writeChat(String playerID, String message, String to) throws RemoteException
      Writes a chat message from a player to another player or the entire game. If the recipient is null, the message is sent to all players in the game.
      Specified by:
      writeChat in interface GameCommand
      Parameters:
      playerID - The ID of the player sending the chat message.
      message - The content of the chat message.
      to - The recipient of the chat message. If null, the message is sent to all players in the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • addScout

      public void addScout(String playerID, Scout scout) throws RemoteException
      Adds a subscriber (Scout) to the game, allowing them to receive updates on the game state.
      Specified by:
      addScout in interface GameCommand
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the scout player.
      scout - The Scout object to be added as a subscriber.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • rejoin

      public void rejoin(String playerID, ClientHandler client)
      Rejoin a player in the game after disconnecting.
      Parameters:
      playerID - The ID of the player to be reloaded.
      client - The ClientHandler object associated with the player.

    • logOut

      public void logOut(String playerID)
      Logs out a player from the game and updates their status.
      Parameters:
      playerID - The ID of the player to be logged out.
